quote_first: “Your holiness,” he called. “Well?” “The horses are here; it’s time for the evening service.” “What o’clock is it?” “A
title: The Bishop
author: Anton Pavlovich Chekhov

quote_first: The party was to begin at seven. The invitations gave the hour as six-thirty because the family knew everyone would come a little late, so as not to be the first to arrive. .. By
quote_last: not another soul could squeeze into the house.
title: The Elderly Lady
author: Jorge Luis Borges
